```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, message = FALSE)
```

```{r load_packages}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r load_data}
train <- read_csv('data/titanic/train.csv')
test <- read_csv('data/titanic/test.csv')
test$Survived <- NA
full <- rbind(train, test)
```

```{r explore_full}
str(full)
dim(full)

summary(full)
```

```{r missing_values}
library(visdat)
vis_dat(full)
vis_miss(full)
```
